pr_title: [GEOT-6545] Encode does not generate a valid WMTS GetCapabilitiesResponse

timeline.message: GEOT-6514 Updates to enable information from WMTS Getcapabilities calls to pass through to the WMTSService class.

Revert "GEOT-6514 Updates to enable information from WMTS Getcapabilities calls to pass through to the WMTSService class."

This reverts commit 3a9ad1cb
GEOT-6514 Updates to enable information from WMTS Getcapabilities calls to pass through to the WMTSService class.

Revert "GEOT-6514 Updates to enable information from WMTS Getcapabilities calls to pass through to the WMTSService class."

This reverts commit 3a9ad1cb

*Corrections made to WMTS bindings to the AbstractComplexEMFBinding as everything uses EMF (Eclipse Modelling Framework)
*Changed StyleBinding, DimensionBinding and TileMatrixBinding to extend DescriptionTypeBinding so that they can populate the relevant ows:DescriptionType fields
*Added in code to use LayerTypeBinding wherever a DatasetDescriptionSummary element is encountered. This is done by setting the resolvedElementDeclaration so the the LayerTypeBinding is used. In addition, within Encoder.java, a change has been made to specifically use the ResolvedElementDeclaration when encoding
*XMLCodegen configuration for gt-xsd-ows updated to generate the BasicIdentificationTypeOws11Binding, DescriptionTypeOws11Binding and IdentificationTypeOws11Binding to support the encoding correct of WMTS
*Added in unit test for WMTS encoding
*Various spelling corrections

timeline.bodyText: new files just have (c) 2020, although this appears generated.
timeline.author: jodygarnett
